original: Araṇaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam sekkham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam asekkham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
